basic.name: Shuriken (Q)
basic.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 damage to the first enemy hit.Stores up to 3 charges.  Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

basic.name: Deflect (W)
basic.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 damage.Total Damage Deflected: 1" Precision="0"/>

basic.name: Swift Strike (E)
basic.description: Dash forward, dealing 190 damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.

heroic.name: Dragonblade (R)
heroic.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 damage.

heroic.name: X-Strike (R)
heroic.description: Perform two slashes dealing 145 damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 damage to enemies in their area.

trait.name: Cyber Agility (T)
trait.description: Activate to jump to the target area.

1.name: Swift as the Wind
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Agile Dismount
1.description: While mounted the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70%, its cooldown is reduced by 14 seconds, and it Slows enemy Heroes in its landing area by 30% for 2 seconds.

1.name: Pathfinder
1.description: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Movement Speed by 25%, and grants Stealth, for 4 seconds.

4.name: Shuriken Mastery
4.description: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken.Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25.Reward: After hitting 60 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 3 charges of Shuriken.

4.name: Strike At The Heart
4.description: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 134 damage after 1 second.

4.name: Dragon Claw
4.description: After Genji blocks 330 damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 damage to all nearby enemies.

7.name: Augmented Guard
7.description: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 100% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

7.name: Perfect Defense
7.description: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

7.name: Cyber Shield
7.description: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.Passive: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 5 seconds.

10.name: Dragonblade
10.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 damage.

10.name: X-Strike
10.description: Perform two slashes dealing 145 damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 290 damage to enemies in their area.

13.name: Shingan
13.description: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 bonus damage.

13.name: Flow Like Water
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

13.name: Way Of The Shimada
13.description: Increase Genji's Basic Attack range by 1.  Each time Genji hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase his Basic Attack damage by 1% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

16.name: Reflect
16.description: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

16.name: Final Cut
16.description: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 damage to all enemies in the area.

16.name: Steady Blade
16.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 30%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
20.description: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by 0.5 seconds. If a Hero is killed within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

20.name: Living Weapon
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Sharpened Stars
20.description: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit. Swift Strike's refund grants 1 charge of Shuriken.

20.name: Zanshin
20.description: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far.Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.
